ModMetaData.name: BioSculptingPlus (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Waether
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Waethers mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2577455618
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr][td][url=https://dsc.gg/mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/BioSculptingPlus][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [h1]Description[/h1]
Adds more cycles type to the biosculpter:
Current new cycles : [list] [*]Beauty cycle Increases a pawn beauty : Staggeringly ugly Ugly Nothing Pretty Beautiful [*]Aging cycle Increases a pawn age by 1 (default, can be modified in settings) [*]Creepy breathing / Annoying voice Fix Removes one of the traits per cycle [*]Tough cycle Make the pawn tough [*]Immunity cycle Increases a pawn immunity trait Sickly None Super-Immune [/list]
All cycles can be enabled/disabled from the mod configuration menu. Cycle time and nutrition required can also be configured, remember to press 'Apply cuctom values' when you are done with your configuration.
[h1]Compatibility[/h1]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2576257954]Faster Biosculpter Pod[/url], is now a required dependency. I use some of it's function to draw the settings menu.
[h1]Current issues[/h1]
None known.
If you encounter bugs please post an issue on [url=https://github.com/Waether/BioSculptingPlus/issues]GitHub[/url] Please post harmony logs when reporting a bug, if I can't reproduce your problem I can't fix it.
[h1]Acknowledgements[/h1]
[url=https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=11022.0]Marnador[/url] for the font used in the preview image and some assets
[h1]Suggestions & Questions[/h1]
Feel free to suggest new functionalities, as long as they are interesting and I have the time I'll probably add them.
Old releases can be found [url=https://github.com/Waether/BioSculptingPlus/releases]here[/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] or the standalone [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Uploader[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
